name: @eluvio/elv-client-js
description: Javascript client for the Eluvio Content Fabric
author: Kevin Talmadge

scripts.build: npm run build-docs && npm run build-dist && npm run build-frame-client && npm run build-permissions-client && npm run build-wallet-client-web && npm run build-wallet-client-node && npm run build-prod
scripts.build-docs: node build/BuildDocs.js && npm run build-client-docs && npm run build-wallet-client-docs
scripts.build-frame-client: webpack -p --progress --entry ./dist/src/FrameClient.js --output-filename ElvFrameClient-min.js --devtool none --optimize-minimize && mv test/bundle-analysis/index.html test/bundle-analysis/frame-client.html
scripts.build-wallet-client-web: webpack -p --progress --mode production --entry ./dist/src/walletClient/index.js --target web --output-filename ElvWalletClient-min.js --devtool none --optimize-minimize && mv test/bundle-analysis/index.html test/bundle-analysis/wallet-client.html
scripts.build-wallet-client-node: webpack -p --progress --mode production --entry ./dist/src/walletClient/index.js --target node --output-filename ElvWalletClient-node-min.js --devtool none --optimize-minimize && mv test/bundle-analysis/index.html test/bundle-analysis/wallet-client.html
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-web && npm run build-node
scripts.build-web: webpack --progress --mode production --target web --output-filename ElvClient-min.js --devtool none && mv test/bundle-analysis/index.html test/bundle-analysis/web.html
scripts.build-node: webpack --progress --mode production --target node --output-filename ElvClient-node-min.js --devtool none && mv test/bundle-analysis/index.html test/bundle-analysis/node.html
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-web-dev && npm run build-node-dev
scripts.add-build: git add dist && git add src/contracts && git add src/events && git add docs
